alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 5:46PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Tolland, southwestern Worcester, southeastern Hampshire and southeastern Hampden Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 545 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ludlow, or 7 miles east of Chicopee. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. Heavy rain in excess of 1 in SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Chicopee, Ludlow, East Longmeadow, Belchertown, Wilbraham, Palmer, Stafford, Somers, Ware, Monson, Granby, Hampden, Warren, Brimfield and Wales. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle.
